### 3. â±ï¸ ETA \(Estimated Time Remaining\)

### 5. ðŸ“Š File Size Information
- Shows file size in MB for each file

### 6. ðŸ”” Desktop Notifications
- Windows notification when processing completes

### 7. ðŸ“ Recent Files History
- Remembers last 10 processed files

### 8. âŒ¨ï¸ Keyboard Shortcuts
- **Ctrl+O**: Open files

## ðŸ“¦ Installation
